programme.title: It ain't Over, Till it's Over
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on President Bill Clinton's impeachment trial.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke celebrates Americans who've coined famous lines and concludes that  "it aint over, till it's over" for President Bill Clinton's impeachment trial.
